item.description:
Come on out and see the band STRETCH play a FREE SHOW at Sally Obriens Bar and Grill!
Located in Union Square at 335 Somerville Ave in Somerville, MA.

Sally Obrien's

Sally Obrien's has food available to those that might want to come early and get a bite to eat.
If there is enough interest we could meet before the show and get a bite to eat somewhere close and have some drinks. I can update the information as we get closer to the night of the event.

Listen to STRETCH!

Stretch is typically a 5 piece Jazz band playing a unique Jazz, Fusion and even Reggae mix.
Dave Hess is playing woodwinds, Paul Erlick and Mike Herman's on Guitars.
George Chinaglia plays Bass and their Drummer Randy Wooten.
Stretch does not play very often so catch them when you can, you won't regret it.
Many people who have seen them insist they are better to hear and see Live than recorded.

Hope to Meetup with some of you there.
There is plenty of time to sign up and schedule to see this group.
E-mail me if you have any questions...
item.how_to_find_us: Sally Obrien's is a relatively small place. It would be pretty hard to miss me. I can provide my cell phone number on request to any meetup member who are planning to attend.
item.why: Please come see this Free Show and enjoy the Unique blend of talented musicians and varied music styles that make up the great Music of Stretch. You won't regret it!
item.name: Stretch (Jazz) @ Sally Obrien's Bar and Grill
